name: io.github.BalajSaleem/criterion
description: Semantic search across 6,236 Quran verses and 12,416 authentic Hadiths for Islamic guidance.

tools.name: search_quran
tools.description: Search 6,236 Quran verses using semantic similarity. Returns verses with ±2 surrounding verses for context. Use this for questions about Quranic guidance, themes, or specific topics.

query.description: Search query for Quran verses (e.g., "patience in hardship")

limit.description: Number of results to return (1-20, default: 7)

tools.name: search_hadith
tools.description: Search 12,416 authentic Hadith narrations from Sahih Bukhari, Sahih Muslim, 40 Hadith Nawawi, and Riyad as-Salihin. Filter by collection and authenticity grade. Use this for questions about Prophet Muhammad's teachings and practices.

query.description: Search query for Hadith (e.g., "charity and good deeds")

collections.description: Comma-separated collection names: bukhari, muslim, nawawi40, riyadussalihin (leave empty for all)

grade.description: Authenticity filter: sahih-only (most authentic), sahih-and-hasan (authentic + good), or all

limit.description: Number of results to return (1-15, default: 5)

tools.name: get_verse
tools.description: Retrieve a specific Quran verse by reference. Use this when you need an exact verse (e.g., Ayat al-Kursi is 2:255).
